plot: A slave switches her light-skinned baby with her master's baby. The child grows up raised by whites.
title: Pudd'nhead Wilson
plot_es: A slave switches her light-skinned baby with her master's baby. The child grows up raised by whites.
plot_en: A slave switches her light-skinned baby with her master's baby. The child grows up raised by whites.

produce.name: Jesse L. Lasky Feature Play Company
